author: amassari
msg: If the receive() function returns 0, it means the connection has been gracefully closed, and we have to stop reading from it (XERCESC-1968)

author: stsp
msg: * tools/dev/unix-build/Makefile.svn: Allow putting cmdline regression test
data (including temporary files) into a ramdisk. The ramdisk is used by
default if it exists and is writable. The default mount point is /ramdisk.
A different location can be specified via the RAMDISK= parameter.

author: bdaniel
msg: Revert change to only inherit interaction intents on interfaces. Though the implementation intents are not used at runtime, they are used for validation.

author: julianfoad
msg: Extend the tests for path canonicalization, and fix a bug thus found.
(canonicalize): Remove a colon that appears before an empty port-number
test_uri_is_canonical): Check also that if the string under test is
supposed to be non-canonical but canonicalizable, then the canonicalize()
